1. "The Notebook" (2004) - A timeless romantic drama that tells the story of two lovers separated by circumstances but reunited after many years.

2. "Crazy, Stupid, Love." (2011) - A comedy-drama about a middle-aged man who learns the art of seduction from a charming womanizer and embarks on his own romantic journey.

3. "La La Land" (2016) - A musical romance that follows the story of an aspiring actress and a jazz musician pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.

4. "Pride and Prejudice" (2005) - A period drama adaptation of Jane Austen's classic novel about the relationship between Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy.

5. "Titanic" (1997) - An epic romance set against the backdrop of the ill-fated ocean liner, focusing on the love story between Jack and Rose.

I hope these recommendations help you find a romantic movie that you will enjoy!
